dmca.title: Oh My?  UK Company ask US Website "Tulips & Bears" to Remove Links
dmca.body:
email to our data center's abuse department:

---------- Forwarded message ---------- From: <david@stand-out.net> Date: Sat, Jul 21, 2012 at 7:12 AM Subject: URGENT Regardinggosearchfor.com To: noc@continuumdatacenters.com As a matter of urgency we require that you remove all the links you have on your website, pointing to www.stand-out.net We believe that these links have been placed or requested by a third party, and that they may be harming our website. We would appreciate your most urgent attention to this matter, and the urgent removal of the links. If you require any clarification please simply reply to this email or telephone (+44) 0844 884 9618. We will revisit your website in a few days to ensure that any links and our trading name has been removed fully. Yours Sincerely David Hamer Soccerbox.com 

-----------------------------------------------
email sent directly to us:

Delivered-To: switzer@bargainbloodhound.com
Received: by 10.58.182.230 with SMTP id eh6csp55502vec;
        Sat, 21 Jul 2012 05:10:47 -0700 (PDT)
Received: by 10.216.123.5 with SMTP id u5mr5504955weh.117.1342872647198;
        Sat, 21 Jul 2012 05:10:47 -0700 (PDT)
Return-Path: <david@stand-out.net>
Received: from stand1.stand-out.net (stand1.stand-out.net. [81.19.187.178])
        by mx.google.com with ESMTPS id j58si9465047wel.87.2012.07.21.05.10.46
        (version=TLSv1/SSLv3 cipher=OTHER);
        Sat, 21 Jul 2012 05:10:47 -0700 (PDT)
Received-SPF: pass (google.com: domain of david@stand-out.net designates 81.19.187.178 as permitted sender) client-ip=81.19.187.178;
Authentication-Results: mx.google.com; spf=pass (google.com: domain of david@stand-out.net designates 81.19.187.178 as permitted sender) smtp.mail=david@stand-out.net
Received: from greenways76.plus.com ([80.229.155.38]:1558 helo=storage2.stand-out.net)
	by stand1.stand-out.net with esmtpa (Exim 4.77)
	(envelope-from <david@stand-out.net>)
	id 1SsYWF-0004CD-La
	for switzer@bargainbloodhound.com; Sat, 21 Jul 2012 13:10:47 +0100
Date: Sat, 21 Jul 2012 13:12:04 +0100
From: david@stand-out.net
To: [private]@bargainbloodhound.com
X-Mailer: Blat v3.0.6, a Win32 SMTP/NNTP mailer http://www.blat.net
Message-ID: <01cd673a$Blat.v3.0.6$0b99d06a$a80b9323510@stand-out.net>
Subject: URGENT Regardinggosearchfor.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7BIT
Content-Type: text/plain;
 charset="ISO-8859-1"
X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report
X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - stand1.stand-out.net
X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - bargainbloodhound.com
X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12]
X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - stand-out.net
X-Source: 
X-Source-Args: 
X-Source-Dir: 

As a matter of urgency we require that you remove all the links you have on your website, pointing to www.stand-out.net

We believe that these links have been placed or requested by a third party, and that they may be harming our website.

We would appreciate your most urgent attention to this matter, and the urgent removal of the links.

If you require any clarification please simply reply to this email or telephone (+44) 0844 884 9618.  We will revisit your website in a few days to ensure that any links and our trading name has been removed fully.

Yours Sincerely
David Hamer
Soccerbox.com
